thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: I shopped for a cold air intake and found one on your website that meet my requirements. I was very surprised that you used UPS ground. I live in Alaska and everyone either refuses to ship here or says it MUST go UPS second day for a considerable sum. Much to my surprise you shipped UPS ground which I really liked. That in itself tells me you care about your customers, that being said I plan to use your site whenever I'm looking for performance parts. An order processed fast and correctly shipped. What more could I ask for, oh reasonably priced items on an easy to use website. What a find in this day and age, thanks.
